SEARCH
Package controller.controllers

Interface AnimationController

All Known Implementing Classes:
BubblesController, EnemiesController, PlayerController
public interface AnimationController
Gives all needed instruments to animate Entities.

  • Method Details

    • update

      void update()
      Updates entity actions to animate

    • draw

      void draw(Graphics g)
      Draws animations
      Parameters:
      g - Graphics graphic motor

    • updateAnimation

      default void updateAnimation(Entity entity, int maxAniIndex)
      Updates animation index, wich will be used to select proper animation image in animations BufferedImage arrays for every entity. aniTick and aniIndex are parameters of entities. When aniTicks reaches ANIMATION_SPEED, the animation image index is increased and aniTick is resetted. When aniIndex reaches maxAniIndex is resetted.
      Parameters:
      entity - Entity to be animated
      maxAniIndex - Max index for specific action,sometimes is the same number for every entity action, sometimes is not (for Player there is a specific method below)

    • setAnimation

      default void setAnimation(Entity entity)
      Updates animation stats for an enemy.
      Parameters:
      enemy -

    • getPlayerSpriteAmount

      default int getPlayerSpriteAmount(int action)
      Gives player animation sprite amount for every action.
      Parameters:
      action - Used in a switch to return corresponding sprite amount
      Returns:
      sprite amount (int)
